engine.sanders.agent
Class ConveyorAgent

java.lang.Object
  engine.agent.Agent
      engine.sanders.agent.ConveyorAgent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Conveyor, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, TReceiver
public class ConveyorAgent
extends Agent
implements Conveyor, TReceiver, java.awt.event.ActionListener

This is an agent class that controls the starting and stopping of a conveyor in the glassline factory

Author:
Justin

ConveyorAgent

public ConveyorAgent(ConveyorFamily cf,
                     Transducer transducer,
                     PopUp popUp,
                     java.lang.Integer index,
                     java.lang.Integer workstationIndex,
                     java.lang.String name)
Contstructor for ConveyorAgent

Parameters:
cf - parent ConveyorFamilyContainer
transducer - transducer that allows communication with the GUI
popUp - the pop up that is within the same ConveyorFamilyContainer
index - the index of the conveyor within the factory
recipe - the code that corresponds with a part that would be machined at the workstation tied to the parent ConveyorFamilyContainer
name - the name of this agent

pickAndExecuteAnAction

public boolean pickAndExecuteAnAction()
Description copied from class: Agent
Agents must implement this scheduler to perform any actions appropriate for the current state. Will be called whenever a state change has occurred, and will be called repeated as long as it returns true.

Specified by:
pickAndExecuteAnAction in class Agent
Returns:
true if some action was executed that might have changed the state.

actionPerformed

public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
This method is called when the startConveyorTimer fires. The purpose of the timer is to spread out the parts to prevent a sensor from thinking that two parts are one.

Specified by:
actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener
